ValidationRule.description: If User Story has apex code, validate that the minimum code coverage has been met.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( copado__Has_Apex_Code__c = true, OR( AND( PRIORVALUE(copado__Promote_Change__c) = false, copado__Promote_Change__c = true ), AND( PRIORVALUE(copado__Promote_and_Deploy__c) = false, copado__Promote_and_Deploy__c = true ) ), OR( ISNULL(copado__Apex_Code_Coverage__c), ISNULL(copado__Minimum_Apex_Code_Coverage__c), copado__Apex_Code_Coverage__c < copado__Minimum_Apex_Code_Coverage__c ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: This User Story does not meet the required Apex coverage threshold to be promoted.
